div.p: Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxviijo die Januarij anno et cetera lxxiiij

quo die coram
preposito et ballivis protribunali sedentibus Johannes ruthirfurd burgensis huius burgi inuenit
alexandrum menyeis plegium legalem pro eo quod Johannes Wormot erit indempnis de
eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter Johannes Wormot inuenit Ricardum
de Kyntor plegium legalem de indempnitate dicti Johannis ruthirfurd

Eodem die Donaldus rede et fynlaus fores conuicti per assisam de perturbacione adin
uicem ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum
et in partem emende quia maior perturbacio inueniebatur cum dicto Donaldo / assisa
ordinavit ipsum Donaldum ad dandum vnam libram cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

The same day before the aldirman and baillies in presence of fynlau fores /
Donald rede of tayn has assignit til Johne Wormot ane hamburgh barel
of salmond the quhilk the said fynlau aw til him and has fundin souertee
tharefor to pay at mydsummir next tocum / togiddir with twa merkis
of siluer acht be the said fynlau tobe pait at paisch next tocum
eftir the tenour of a certane compromis for the quhilkis twa merkis fyn
law fores has fundin Alexander menyes borch and souertie tocontent and pay
thame til the said Donald rede betuix this and the feist of
pask next tocum and assignit be the said Donald til Johne Wormot as said is
Item Johne of lammynton gravntis him borch and souertie for the said hamburgh barel of
salmond tobe pait til Donald rede in tayn at mydsummir next tocum

Item the said day In presence of the baillies sittand in Jugement comperit
William voket burges of this burgh and perofferit to thame
to deliuer certane pennyworthis tobe prisit to the avale and pay
ment of twa hamburgh barellis of salmond clamit be henrik
hartwikson quhen evir he beis lachfully warnit thareto
before thir witnes Alexander menyes gilbert morison thomas symson
Wil of cadiou androw branche Johne of lammynton and alexander chavmer
Johne the Vaus and Duncan of straloch thre of the seriandis of the said
burgh and vthiris sindrie

The penult day of Januare the aldirman and consel has decretit and ordanit that
thomas prat sal content and pay til Johne of ruthirfurd within xv daies the
some' of ten merkis of vsuale monee of scotland anent Johne robertson of
tarvas because that the said thomas come souertie for him and was oblist til
gilbert of chavmer ane of the baillies til haue enterit him before the
balyeis the forsaid day or than to pay the said some' / and he entirit him nocht

Eodem die Alexander de camera filius cum consensu prepositi et communis consilij Receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi racione paterne libertatis prestito solito
v s' Juramento / pro qua libertate dedit preposito v s' in alba bursa

The same day because thare was na dene of gilde chosin on the friday next
eftir that the aldirman was chosin and that the tyme of his chesing was sa lang
by runnyn It is ordanit deliuerit and concludit be the hail consel present in the tyme
of the quhilkis the names eftir folowis / that thare sal na dene of gilde
be chosin for this yere bot the aldirman quhilk has had the vse of that
office and intrometting of it hiddirtillis sen he was chosin aldirman And he
tomak commpt tharof at the Ische of his aldirmanschip as efferis / Thir ar
the personis that war present in the tyme and consentit tharto na man gainsayand of
thaim Alexander menyes Johne of mar Androw alanson Richard of Kyntor Johne
Wode alexander blinschel Johne of Knollis Dauid colison Dauid symson
gilbert the Vaus gilbert of chamer Dauid menyes Dauid mathoson
Edmond lawson Dauid mathoson and patrik badenach et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio tercio die februarij anno et cetera lxxiiijto

quo die Edmundus
banerman adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro eo quod porrexit plegium quod Ricardus Kyntor
Dauid colison et alexander blinschel non perhiberent testimonium super quondam promisso x marcarum de
defalcacione cuiusdam summe sibi debit' pro redempcione terrarum de bogfarlan per eundem ut asseriebatur fact'
et per eundem negat' / desuper suas raciones assignando / quod quidem plegius prepositus nomine ville requiriavit
per suas raciones Et wardatum fuit per curiam quod recontrariacio dicti plegij fuit valida et cetera
Vnde deliberatum fuit per assisam / dictis preposito nomine ville et edmundo obligatis per extensionem manuum
suarum ad standum eiusdem assise decreto et ordinacione / quod dictus edmundus soluet et satisfaciet preposito
nomine communitatis huius burgi quinque marcas de dicta summa x marcarum

Eodem die Edmundus banerman inuenit alexandrum menyes plegium legalem de indempnitate
Ricardi Kyntor aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter dictus Ricardus dedit andream branch
plegium legalem de indempnitate prefati edmundj

Die quarta februarij Johannes thomson incola edinburgi in amerciamento pro perturbacione Duncani
scot sed reperiebatur per assisam maxime in sua defencione Et dictus Duncanus in amerciamento pro pertur
bacione dicti Johannis et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio sexto die februarii anno et cetera lxxiiijto quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd primo die vocatus ad intrandum ad sectam Johannis moir
pro iniusta detencione iiijor s' et vj g' monete flandrie pro quibus promisit soluere dicto
Johanni moir ut asserit in grossis anglicanis Non comparuit Et ideo precipitur sergeando
quod capiat districtum et cetera

Johannes rutirfurd comparuit et summisit se ad assisam super dicto plegio per quam assisam iuratam
deliberatum fuit / quod Willelmus de Kyntor per confessionem suam propriam deuenit debitor dicto
Johanni moir ex parte Johannis ruthirfurd pro x s' de predicta summa
Et residuum dicte summe Johannis ruthirfurd inuenit Robertum blinsel plegium ad satisfaciendum dicto
Johanni moir infra terminum Juris

The same day Johne of cathkyn before gilbert of chavmer ane of the baillies ser
Johne frostar chaplan and vthiris gravntit that he is awand til Johne stevinson eldar
and til his wif a made chargeour weyand v li' of pewder and todeliuer to thaim
the said chargeour within xv daies / and gif the said chargeour weyis mare than
v li' the said Johne cathkyn salbe pait in alsfer as it weyis tharatour / and
gif it wavntis of the said wecht / he sal fulfil and content thame tharof at the
said terme

Thomas bawne in amerciamento pro perturbacione Donaldi valantine prout inuentum fuit per
assisam
Johannes moir in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johannem ruthirfurd ut prescribitur

Willelmus modan in amerciamento pro iniusta extensione plegij aduersus gilbertum morison asserendo quod
iniuste detinuit ab eo x s' pro firma ijarum domorum sive domuum sibi assedat' per ipsum
quia dictus gilbertus purgauit se ex deliberacione assise de dicto clameo dicens quod satisfe
cit eidem Willelmo preterquam de v s' quos soluit sibi in curia et cetera quitus de residuo per
suum Juramentum et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus androson filius Johannis andree primo die vocatus ad sectam Dauid
hil pro iniusta detencione triginta solidorum pro certis mercimoniis panni viridis lanei
Non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capiat districtum ab eodem et cetera et ad premuniendum ipsum
ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad 2m diem processus

The same day James of Kyntor assignit all his wattir quhilk he has in tak
and assedacion' of this burgh til Anny his wif for all his termys before
alexander of chavmer aldirman Alexander menyes Richard of Kyntor Dauid menyes
ane of the baillies gilbert the Vaus Dauid lesly Necol of suthirland
and vthiris

The ix day of februare the yere forsaid Comperit before the aldirman
and Dauid menyes and gilbert of chamour twa of the baillies in the tolbuthe
Johne of ruthirfurd and Wil Robertson producit in witnes be Paule symonson
maistir of a schip of Danskyn anent ane scottis crowne of our' fracht
quhilkis the saidis Johne and Wil merchandis of the said schip soulde haf pait
the quhilkis witnes the gret aith sworne deponit that the said maistir
assignit thaim the saidis merchandis to pay til Edrian for part of his fee the said crowne
to the quhilk thai gravntit and deponit that the said Edrian tuke til thare
payment and dischargit the said maistir anent that crowne

heratour the said witnes deponit that thai war by and herd quhen the said
Edriane promittit til deliuer to the said maistir for xiiij smal barellis
vij dusan of dry skatis
Curia ballivorum tenta xo die februarij /

quo die Thomas bawne conuictus per
assisam pro perturbacione Duncani straloch vnius seriandorum in verbo suum officium excer
cendum adiudicatur in amerciamento
Robertus cowpar in amerciamento pro perturbacione curie prout inuentum fuit per assisam

Item quidam faber nuncupatus Donaldus in amerciamento ut supra pro perturbacione Duncani
lammynton et cetera

Eodem die Ebota Wode filia quondam Thome Wode burgensis de aberdene personaliter
comparens coram preposito et ballivis protribunali sedentibus elegit et constituit Johannem Wode
burgensem dicti burgi presentem cum eadem in suum procuratorem et deputatum / ad gubernandum et
intromittendum cum vniuersis bonis eedem pertinentibus seu spectare valentibus per de
cessum dicti quondam thome patris sui et matris sue dummodo ad etatem peruenerit legit
timam / et ad agendum pro premissis et prosequendum detentores eorundem prout Jura
volunt et requirunt

Dauid hil in amerciamento pro iniusta extensione plegij super Willelmum andree de iniusta detencione xxx s'
pro panno viridi et cetera

Item eodem die alexander sanquhare accusatus pro deforciacione alexandri chavmer vnius seriandorum
ipsum distringen' pro quadam summa argenti debit' andree branch /. quitus factus fuit
per assisam / que deliberauit quod dictus sergeandus habuit in manibus suis ex parte eiusdem
alexandri sanquhar xxviij d' ad solucionem dicti andree branch

The same day the aldirman and thir personis of the consel vndirwritin with ane assent and consent
has chosin and ordanit ser Androw Wrycht chaplan maistir of the kirk wark of sanct
Nicholace for a yere tocum and forthir tobe continevit eftir as he makis gude seruice
at the wil of the aldirman and the toune / that is tosay Alexander menyes androw alanson
Johne of mar Johne Wode / Johne of Knollis Dauid colison alexander howison
Dauid symson Dauid menyes gilbert of chavmer thre of the baillies gilbert
the vaus thomas of chamour alexander rede William malisson thom prat and Dauy
mathoson / And the said ser androw sal mak commpt yerlie of his Ressate and
expensis /. for the quhilk he sal haue til his fee in the yer' xl s' togiddir
with the twa merkis that he was wovnt til haue for the keping of the farding

Item the same day / the aldirman and the forsaidis persons of the consel has set in assedacio
ne til gilbert morison thare nychtbour for a hail yere next folowand / the
sundais fisch and sanct Nicholes met of salt and quhete quhen it fallis and the ton'
fracht for the quhilkis he sal pay to the maistir of Sanct Nicholace kirk wark
of the said yere fyve pundis of vsuale money be lammes next tocum
hec presens assedacio renouatur pro maiori summa ut patet in 2o folio sequente

Item the forsaid day the persons of the consel before writin has ordanit and
consentit that the aldirman sal by a surplys til ser William scot / because he
wavntis ane sa that he may honestly serue in the qweyr amang his falouis

The xj day of februare the yere et cetera lxxiiij Robert blindsel in presence of the
aldirman hand consel has fundin Alexander rede law borch for him that gilbert
morison salbe vndistrublit of him vthiris wais than the cours of common
law wil And rychtsa thomas of chamer is becumin law borch for the said
gilbert that the forsaid Robert salbe vndistrublit vthirwais than said is

Eodem die Willelmus lowson adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta extensione plegij super
Johannem hil / eo quod dictus Johannes tanquam mercator sibi in hac parte non fecit ut
asseruit quod de Jure debuit ad sedulam ipsius Willelmi secundum tenorem eiusdem penes
certas mercancias et disposicionem earundem Et dictus Johannes quitus per assisam proborum
ad hoc Juratorum factus fuit pro perpetuo de dicto clameo eiusdem Willelmi sibi silen
cium imponendo

Item eodem die Johannes Wormot comparens coram preposito et ballivis fatebatur se plenarie
contentum et solutum de decem barellis salmonum per thomam simson pro quibus idem thomas
deuenit sibi debitor pro Johanne andree et Johanne Kyntor scriptum in libro ipsius Johannis
Wormot /. vnde dictum thomam quieteclamavit et exoneravit imperpetuum de solucione dictorum
salmonum tenore presentis actus

The forsaid day the aldirman and the consel has set the sundais fisch the wattirmet
of salt and quhete and the ton' fracht as it fallis til Gilbert morison for
a yere next tocum . ffor the quhilk assedacione and tak of the saidis dewiteis
pertenand to sanct Nicholace wark / the forsaid gilbert has fundin Johne Wormot
souertie topay to the maistir of the kirk wark of sanct Nicholace for the said yeris
tak aucht merkis and fourty pennyis of vsuale money of scotland Nochtwith
standing the assedacione made til the said gilbert tharupon of before / fra the
quhilk he grauntit him todesist and gaf our' the same to the aldirman and consel
for the augmentacione of the mare some' to the kirk wark tobe pait be
lammes next folowand et cetera
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xiijo die februarij

quo die thomas culan conuictus
per assisam de perturbacione Walteri pyot in verbo tantum adiudicatur in amerciamento Et eodemmodi
Walterus pyot in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione dicti thome tam verbo quam facto in extractione
cultelli ad eundem / et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt
matheus cowpar in amerciamento pro perturbacione andree lammynton in verbo prout inuentum fuit per assisam

Eodem die coram preposito et consulibus propter Reuocacionem plegiorum legalium Robertus blinschel
inuenit alexandrum rede plegium legalem de indempnitate gilberti morison aliter quam per viam Juris
Similiter alexander hay deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Robertus erit indempnis de
dicto gilberto secundum quod Jura volunt

Item Andreas scherar deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne ruthirfurd filio alexandri quod
gilbertus morison erit indempnis secundum quod Jura volunt

Item Robertus blindsel deuenit plegius legalis Johanni vaus vni ballivorum pro thoma
blindsel fratre suo germano de indempnitate dicti gilberti morison aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die gilbertus morison fecit et ordinavit lindesay harrald' burgensem de abirdene
suum procuratorem et deputatum specialem ad petendum et recipiendum a Cristiana Irvyn
Relicta quondam Cristinj litstar nomine suo tanquam tutore testamentali heredum dicti cristinj
omnia et singula bona ad hereditatem dictorum heredum pertinencia Et eandem cristianam desuper
prosequendum prout Jura volunt agend' et defend' ea que ipse constituens faceret
seu facere posset si personaliter interesset Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris procuratorij
clausulis necessariis et oportunis testibus Alexandro de camera preposito Dauid menyes
vno ballivorum et alexandro chamer seriandorum vno de abirdene cum aliis

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio coram preposito ballivis et consulibus burgi de aberdene
xiiijto die februarij anno et cetera lxxiiijto Paulus simonis Johneson in
amerciamento curie convictus per assisam de iniusta porrectione plegij super Dauid blabre
pro iniusta detencione ut asseruit sui le hyre et prandij per dictum Dauid
Et dictus Dauid quitus per assisam de suo clameo antedicto

Eodem die Robertus de Kyntor coram balliuis protribunali sedentibus fatebatur se debere
Dauid de mar vj s' et ii d' et iniungitur eidem ad satisfaciendum dictam
summam infra terminum Juris

The same day Cristian of Irvyn spous' til quhilum Cristy litstar lachfully
summonit be Alexander of chavmer ane of the seriandis of the burgh of abirdene to compere
before the aldirman baillies and consel of abirdene the forsaid xiiij day of februare to
schav hir resone and rycht quhy that scho occupijs the towne of the Garrowne with
the pertinencis pertenand to the fredome of the said burgh The quhilk Cristian oft ty
mes callit / comperit nocht nothir be hir self nor hir procuratour and lachfull tyme
of the day bigane Quharfor because of hir contumace that sche comperit nocht
scho beand lachfully summonit as said is at the towne of the garrowne
before thir witnes that is to say Adam of cardny Johne of hil and Wil modan
quhilkis the gret aith sworne the haly ewangelis twichit in presence of
the hail court deponit that thai war by hard and saw and for witnes war
chargit quhen the said alexander of chavmer seriand summonit the forsaid cristian
as said is eftir the tenour of the precept direct til him tharupon the quhilk sum
mons beand previt / the aldirman baillies and consel of the burgh forsaid char
git the forsaid alexander seriand to pas to the towne of the garrowne and summonde
lachfully and before suffisant witnes the said Cristian to compere before
the aldirman baillies and consel of abirdene in the tolbuthe of that ilk the secund day
of marche next tocum in the houre of caus' as for the second day of proces
to ansuer' for the caus' forsaid et cetera And that he soulde tak ane distres for hir
absence fra the first day / and gif it to borch gif it beis askit

Alsua the said cristian Irvyn oft tymes callit to compere in this present court as
scho was summonit for soyt and nocht comperit / for the quhilk scho was adiu
git in amerciament of this court sik as scho aw to tyne of law et cetera
